item.title: In 2015, Meliá Hotels opened at least 11 new locations
item.description:
Meliá Hotels International is adding at least 11 new hotels to its portfolio in 2015, including the Sol House Kuta Bali in Indonesia. Source: Meliá Hotels website. The recently opened 317-room Meliá Doha, which began welcoming guests in January, is the first Spanish hotel in Qatar. Located within Bin Samikh Tower, a prominent skyscraper in Doha’s West Bay district, the hotel enjoys a prime position on the Qatari coast. The urban German brand, Innside by Meliá, is expanding its Middle Eastern presence with the upcoming Innside Dubai, a 125-room hotel...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/in-2015-meli-hotels-opened-at-least-11-new-locations/
